info.name: Beepay-Laravel
info.description:
Back-end PHP - Laravel

This is a challenge for create endpoints with Laravel for Beepay.

Created by Marcos Vinícius Coelho

[mviniciusca@gmail.com](https://mailto:mviniciusca@gmail.com)

[github.com/mviniciusca](https://github.com/mviniciusca)

Before Test:

• Run Laravel Server

• Enable MySQL and Redis

Antes de Testar:

• Rode a Aplicação Laravel

• Habilite MySQL e Redis

request.description:
List patients on database.

Lista os pacientes no banco de dados.
